Shimada Y , et al. Irinotecan plus S‐1 (IRIS) versus fluorouracil and folinic acid plus irinotecan (FOLFIRI) as second‐line chemotherapy for metastatic colorectal cancer: a randomised phase 2/3 non‐inferiority study (FIRIS study). Lancet Oncol. 2010; 11( 9): 853‐ 860. 20708966
